edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.cs56_games_maze

Class NewStepGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.cs56_games_maze.MazeGenerator
      • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.cs56_games_maze.NewStepGenerator

  • public class NewStepGenerator
extends MazeGenerator
    NewStepGenerator runs off the newest added cell each step. The algorithm runs by creating a GenChain and calling stepNew() in each call to step().
    Version:
    MazeGame CP1 for CS56, Spring 2012
    Author:
    Jakob Staahl

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.cs56_games_maze.MazeGenerator

        grid

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NewStepGenerator(MazeGrid grid)
      Constructs a NewStepGenerator with this MazeGrid grid
      NewStepGenerator(MazeGrid grid, int distance)
      Constructs a NewStepGenerator where each step is a tunnel of distance number of cells (or less if a tunel of that length cannot be constructed due to an obstruction)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generate()
      Generates the entire Maze in MazeGrid
      boolean step()
      Steps the maze generating algorithm once Best used for watching the maze being generating by calling MazeComponent.repaint() and Thread.sleep() between each step

    • Constructor Detail

      • NewStepGenerator

        public NewStepGenerator(MazeGrid grid)
        Constructs a NewStepGenerator with this MazeGrid grid
        Parameters:
        grid - the MazeGrid this NewStepGenerator will run its maze generating algorithm on
        See Also:
        MazeGrid

      • NewStepGenerator

        public NewStepGenerator(MazeGrid grid,
                        int distance)
        Constructs a NewStepGenerator where each step is a tunnel of distance number of cells (or less if a tunel of that length cannot be constructed due to an obstruction)
        Parameters:
        grid - the MazeGrid this NewStepGenerator will run its maze generating algorithm on
        distance - the length of the tunnels generated at each step
        See Also:
        MazeGrid

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public void generate()
        Generates the entire Maze in MazeGrid
        Specified by:
        generate in class MazeGenerator

      • step

        public boolean step()
        Steps the maze generating algorithm once Best used for watching the maze being generating by calling MazeComponent.repaint() and Thread.sleep() between each step
        Specified by:
        step in class MazeGenerator
        Returns:
        returns true if the generator can still step, false if the maze has stepped to completion
